EmailTemplate.name: CSC Email Receipt EBSH Botswana
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c} Thank you for your email.
This is an automated acknowledgement confirming receipt of your request which will be attended to shortly.
Operating hours
The Botswana Commercial Contact Centre will be available Monday to Friday 08:00 - 17:00 and Saturdays 08:00 to 12:00.
Thank you
Botswana Commercial Contact Centre Local: 0800 600 787 International: +267 315 9524
